Name: Forest spiders
About the game: This is a first person action adventure game,The player is located in a forest full of spiders,Players are free to explore the surrounding area,Players have both long knives and bows and arrows, and must avoid or kill monsters,Players need to survive as long as possible. Control keys: Right-click targeting WASD movement The left Shift running Left mouse button attack Space leaping The left Ctrl squats Mouse control direction Mouse wheel switch weapons
